name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Shenyang, Liaoning. A woman reported under her real name that she went to Beijing to petition because her house was demolished and was forcibly sent to a mental hospital by several public officials. She was detained for 344 days and suffered serious physical and mental damage. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886445846805565440/pu/img/rJ7snsW4hFvpx1S4.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Philippine Immigration Bureau said that Chinese spies have integrated into society.
In a press release, Philippine Immigration Bureau Director Viado said that the five suspected Chinese nationals arrested in Palawan Province on January 25 were all members of overseas Chinese groups and had lived in the Philippines for ten years, some of whom had moved to the Philippines as early as 2002.
He said that foreign spies seemed to have integrated into Philippine society and called on the public to be vigilant and report any suspicious activities involving foreigners. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi4RXooa4AQjAdF.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 4 (Release) Chengmai, Hainan. A person riding an electric bike was fined 1,500 yuan by the traffic police for driving without a license, and was fined 50 yuan for not wearing a helmet. The electric bike was detained. The traffic police said, "The purpose of the punishment is not to fine." This caused heated discussions, and some netizens said that this electric bike is not worth 1,500 yuan. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886645330097397761/pu/img/sJmOZESf2hvCwZKa.jpg

Property: The whole city is unified to give tourists a better travel experience. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886696827661246465/pu/img/7B0mqi2jfDEiREYt.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Big S died of influenza-related pneumonia in Japan at the age of 48. At the same time, "Japanese flu" related terms also became a hot search.
Taiwanese media reported that Chinese media reported extensively on the record number of influenza infections in Japan. At the end of December last year, the number of influenza cases in Japan reached the highest level in statistical history, and the total number of medical visits in Japan was estimated to be about 9.523 million.
Taiwanese media quoted a report from the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare of Japan, pointing out that the peak of the influenza epidemic in Japan may have passed and is currently declining. In the past week, the average number of patients in each medical institution across the country has dropped to 11.06, which is lower than the 30 people required to issue an alert, and a significant decrease from the peak of 64.39. The report still calls on the public to continue to take epidemic prevention measures to avoid infection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 2, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A woman said that her dog ran outside after being frightened by firecrackers on the first day of the Lunar New Year and mistakenly entered the Beijing-Hong Kong-Macao Expressway. It was then pulled away by road maintenance workers and slaughtered and eaten. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi7zrYxa8AAgW2d.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United States said that under the new tariffs, packages from China will face a 10% tariff.
The U.S. Customs and Border Protection Agency posted a notice online on Monday (February 3) stating that mail packages from China must go through formal customs entry procedures. The notice said that Chinese imports that qualify for temporary duty-free status will also be subject to a 10% U.S. tariff. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi7209IakAAYGj-.png

content: On February 4, a recruitment advertisement of a matchmaking agency was circulated on the Internet. The advertisement stated that "local public institutions, state-owned enterprises, central enterprises and other blind date specials have stable jobs and middle and high-level blind dates." This triggered discussions among netizens. Netizens said: good jobs are only transmitted through blood and sex; class barriers and reproductive isolation. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi7-f2ta4AENEwO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 31, a tanker overturned in Yongzhou City, Hunan Province, causing a leak of crude benzene, a dangerous chemical. Local officials said that emergency on-site disposal had been carried out, no casualties were caused, and the local urban water supply was normal.
Although the official announcement was issued, as of February 4, many local people were still rushing to buy drinking water in supermarkets
Crude benzene is highly toxic, and long-term exposure or high-concentration contact can cause neurotoxicity and other health problems. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886730225058504709/pu/img/Gsw38A7WYMmiCn4f.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of February 4, the National Primary and Secondary School Overtime Learning Project has received submissions from students from 716 schools across the country.
In terms of the number of schools on the "Shame List", the top five provinces are: Shandong (85), Henan (68), Guangdong (56), Hebei (52) and Jiangsu (48).
The provinces with the most suicides in school in 24 years are Shandong (119), Henan (99), and Hebei (76). https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi8dusRWMAAyh48.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Market Supervision Bureau launched an antitrust investigation into Google. Caixin reported that the content of the investigation has yet to be clarified. Market analysis shows that the Android mobile operating system, Google service framework, and essential mobile phone applications may involve monopoly. Previously, Google refused to cooperate with Huawei. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi8d85KbYAAiiFo.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, blogger "Shakespeare of One Person" talked about the Spring Festival Gala robot waving handkerchiefs. He said that the Yushu robot danced the Yangko and twisted the sky of the United States down again, and praised the robot in the video.
Later, many bloggers pointed out that the robot seemed to use fishing line to connect the handkerchief. Some people used simple parts to replicate the effect of the Spring Festival Gala robot turning the handkerchief. Blogger Jin Chi said that he hoped to do scientific research in a down-to-earth manner and not win the game right away. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1886764386989301762/pu/img/q43ubsAxAb2O3afF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens discovered that in the opening scene of the movie "The Legend of the Condor Heroes: The Greatest Hero", the protagonist Guo Jing said: "My name is Guo Jing. I was born in troubled times. In the late Northern Song Dynasty, the Song court was constantly suppressed by the Jin court..." This triggered criticism from netizens. Netizens said that there was no Northern Song Dynasty in the era in which Guo Jing lived, and "born in troubled times" was a wrong sentence. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi8qN20a4AI7Y49.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Wall Street Journal: The flood of Chinese imports that began hitting the United States about 25 years ago has fundamentally changed the American economy, upended manufacturing communities, hurt working-class interests and sowed discontent with globalization.
Research shows that the retail and restaurant industries have helped communities hit by cheap Chinese goods recover, but this has not been much help for factory workers. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi8v2Mqa4AEgn44.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to the current blockage in China, we have received a large number of applications for us to authorize mirrors.
Here we emphasize that, like all our past tweets, anyone can use this data for dissemination, research and creation. At the same time, anyone can also mirror the website to China.
We also welcome netizens to collect data in their own way and further supplement the table.
Attachment: Self-made mirroring plan by netizens:
Safety guidelines:
1. Do not use any server, domain name or other product provided by any domestic cloud service provider for mirroring
2. Do not use the mirror as your real-life topic to avoid security risks
3. You can inform us of your mirror address or domain name through https://t.co/7M5bdn9jfX submission mailbox humanright@lidao.pro, and we will regularly disseminate (this will also cause the address or domain name...
fullContent:
由于目前被中国屏蔽，我们收到大量希望我们授权镜像的申请。
在此我们强调，和我们过去的所有推文一样，任何人都可以使用这些数据进行传播，研究和创作。同时任何人也都可以把网站镜像到国内。
我们也欢迎网友们通过自己的方式搜集到数据后对表格进行进一步的补充。
附：网友自制镜像方案：
安全指引：
1. 不要使用任何国内云服务商提供的服务器，域名或其他产品进行镜像 
2. 不要将镜像  作为您将现实生活中的谈资，以避免安全风险
3. 您可以通过 https://t.co/7M5bdn9jfX 投稿邮箱 humanright@lidao.pro 告知我们您镜像的地址或域名，我们会定期传播（这也会导致该地址或域名在一定时间后被 GFW 封锁）

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Deutsche Welle: Due to the heavy losses of the Russian army in the Russian-Ukrainian battlefield and the serious shortage of troops, the wounded in the war were also sent to the front line, and these wounded were still on crutches. Russian Defense Minister Tsivlyova said that due to the modernization of field hospitals, 96% of the Russian army’s wounded have returned to the front line. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi84oT_a4AMSddv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's State Administration for Market Regulation announced on Tuesday that it had launched a competition investigation into Google, and two people familiar with the matter said the investigation will focus on the market dominance brought by Google's Android operating system and the harm caused to Chinese mobile phone manufacturers such as OPPO and Xiaomi that use the software.
Chinese regulators announced a similar antitrust investigation into Nvidia in December and are now also considering a formal investigation into Intel, two people familiar with the matter said. However, one of the people familiar with the matter said the nature of the investigation into the U.S. chip maker remains unclear, adding that whether to formally launch an investigation may be affected by the state of Sino-U.S. relations. President Xi Jinping is expected to speak with President Trump in the coming days.
Liu Xu, a researcher at the National Institute of Strategic Studies at Tsinghua University, said the investigation into the technology industry "may be China's retaliatory measures against Trump's new tariffs on China...
fullContent:
中国市监总局周二宣布已对Google展开竞争调查，两位熟悉内情的人士称，调查将重点关注Google Android操作系统带来的市场主导地位，以及对使用该软件的OPPO和小米等中国手机制造商造成的伤害。
 两位熟悉内情的人士说，中国监管机构曾在12月宣布对英伟达展开类似的反垄断调查，现在也在考虑对英特尔展开正式调查。不过，其中一位知情人士说，对这家美国芯片制造商的调查性质仍不清楚，并补充说，是否正式启动调查可能会受到中美关系状况的影响。 预计习近平主席将在未来几天与特朗普总统通话。
 清华大学国家战略研究院研究员刘旭说，针对科技行业的调查"可能是中国针对特朗普针对中国的新关税所采取的报复措施的一部分，中国政府密集地针对美国知名科技公司立案调查，因为这些公司正日益陷入两个全球大国之间日益紧张的关系的交火之中。"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Previously, a Japanese netizen tested DeepSeekR1 and asked it to write a pornographic novel. The result prompted: "Violation of OpenAI's policy"
Currently, a blogger found after testing that DeepSeek has fixed the problem of displaying "according to OpenAI's content policy" under specific prompt words.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gi9EXRaa4AI4V9O.jpg
